articles.title: [Funding alert] CRED raises $81M in Series C round at a valuation of $806M; buys back ESOP worth $1.2M - YourStory
articles.description: CRED said DST Global along with Sequoia Capital, Ribbit Capital, Tiger Global, and General Catalyst invested in the Series C round. Besides, Sofina, Coatue, and Times Internet's Satyan Gajwani also participated.
articles.content: CRED, the Bengaluru-headquartered fintech startup founded by Kunal Shah, on Monday officially announced its Series C funding round of $81 million at a valuation of $806 million. Moreover, the fintech… [+1823 chars]
